CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sector Beta relative to Stellar City Core?
SRP.A: Sector Beta is {below} Stellar City Core in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar City Core relative to Sector Beta?
SRP.A: Stellar City Core is {above} Sector Beta in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing District Alpha relative to Sector Beta?
SRP.A: District Alpha is {above} Sector Beta in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Verdant Ward}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Enclave}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sector Beta's maximum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sector Beta's maximum Vaccination Rate is in {2008}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sector Beta's minimum Vaccination Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sector Beta's minimum Vaccination Rate is in {2004}.

NC.Q: Was the total Vaccination Rate in 2007 higher or lower than in 2008?
NC.A: The total vaccination rate in 2007 was {lower} than in 2008.

NC.Q: Was the total Vaccination Rate in 2002 higher or lower than in 2019?
NC.A: The total vaccination rate in 2002 was {lower} than in 2019.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2013, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2016 and 2019?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 1999 and 2013 was {smaller} than between 2016 and 2019.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2011, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2005 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 2008 and 2011 was {larger} than between 2005 and 2010.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {District Alpha} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did District Alpha and Stellar City Core first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: District Alpha and Stellar City Core first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
